name: Eri-Platform
goal: Eri-Platform AISBL is an international civil association that advocates inclusive dialogue, both live and online, mainly among Eritreans at home and in the Diaspora and friends of Eritrea, as well as in the Horn of Africa, to help resolve conflicts, bridge divisions, and pursue common goals among different or diverse political, civil, human rights and media groups. It works to promote multifaceted consultations to cultivate an understanding of and respect for the rule of law, democratic principles and human rights.
interests: Education and training, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Youth
euInitiatives: Granted legal personality as an international civil association under Belgian law and first registered on EU Transparency Register on 21 March 2013, Eri-Platform AISBL advocates the supremacy of the rule of law, adherence to democratic principles, respect for human rights, celebration of diversity and the pursuit of social justice as essential elements for a viable system of democratic governance.
